3rd Party Memory Boards  

 

  

   Installation Instructions

 

   MyDOS 4.53/R Disk .atr

 

 

 

Front

Back

 

The Bob Hays 512K RAMdisk memory board is a fairly modern device.   Done in a more compact formfactor than most other previous devices.   This is a Slot #2 device and provides both standard 16K of memory as well as a 512K RAMdisk when used with a DOS that supports Axlon compatible RAMdisks such as the included MyDos 4.53/R version that is included with the board.

You'll note, there is a small jumper lead, this must be connected to chip A403, pin #20 on the Atari OS board to enable the 512K board full functionality.

 

It is unknown if Bob Hays is still selling these boards as he does not seem to respond anymore to emails sent to him on his website:   http://www.bobhays.com/atari512k.html
